function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate vaccination coverage leading to continued virus spread","Impact":"Sustained pandemic with ongoing infections and deaths","Mitigation":"Increasing vaccine production and distribution, prioritizing vulnerable populations","Technologies":"Vaccine production technology, vaccine distribution logistics","People":"General population, vulnerable groups","Owner":"Health authorities, vaccine manufacturers"},{"Description":"Insufficient mass vaccination infrastructure","Impact":"Inability to vaccinate large numbers of people efficiently, leading to delayed containment of the pandemic","Mitigation":"Designing and setting up mass vaccination centers, training personnel, ensuring adequate vaccine supply","Technologies":"Infrastructure design, logistics management","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, healthcare authorities"},{"Description":"Delay in implementing lockdown measures","Impact":"Increased R0, prolonged pandemic, and greater strain on healthcare system","Mitigation":"Implementing timely and effective lockdown measures, enforcing compliance with restrictions","Technologies":"Epidemiological modeling, monitoring and enforcement technology","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health agencies"}]}
